div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 660 Cavalla (anc. Neapolis), Macedonia, 1963 Burial: 55-50 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 114 AR Aesillas: c. 14 tetradr. Roman Rep.: c. 100 den. (to 55 B.C., fdc) Disposition: dispersed Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 54, note 7 and supple- mentary information by correspondence
